name: Quest for Shirt
description:
Made for AdvX Game Jam 2020

You are Steve "stepurhan" Brown 

(For my first proper game, especially for a Game Jam, I thought I would use a character I am familiar with for the PC. All other names have been changed to protect the probably innocent). 

Having made the trip to another AdventureX you have discovered a packing disaster. You have only packed black shirts!!!!

How will people be able to recognise you if you are not wearing your trademark brightly coloured shirts? Perhaps you can use your adventure gaming skills to create a new shirt in the event itself. 

N.B. Whilst this engine uses hyperlinks to make many interactions easier you will still need to type some commands (e.g. "use hands on keyboard" or "give praise to author") Objects can usually be shortened to single key words.
